title: Babushka's - Hyde Park, Tampa - Menu, Reviews (525), Photos (107) - Restaurantji
text: Babushka's - Hyde Park $$ â¢ Modern European Hours: 901 W Platt St, Tampa (813) 867-8999 About Babushka's - Hyde Park Babushka's - Hyde Park is a charming Russian restaurant offering delicious and authentic Eastern European dishes in a cozy, stylish space. The menu includes standouts such as beef blinchiki, Siberian dumplings, chicken shashlik, and Russian pierogis, along with flavorful options like Beef Stroganoff, Lamb Plov, Chicken Kyiv, and Golubsty. The borscht soup is a must-try for first-timers, and the Napoleon cake for dessert is light, creamy, and absolutely delicious. The servers are friendly and attentive, offering excellent recommendations. The live pianist adds the perfect jazz ambiance. Free parking is a big plus, making the location easy to find. Customers have praised the excellent dining experience, delicious food and drinks, and the welcoming atmosphere, with one reviewer particularly commending the attentive and efficient service provided by the waiter Antoine. Customers' Favorites Babushka's - Hyde Park Reviews The borscht was better than I expected. I had never tried borscht before, but I thought it might have a strong beet flavor. Instead, it was a delightful root vegetable broth with beef and light goulash spices! Next time I will eat it inside as the restaurant has a pleasant ambiance and the soup was too hot for the plastic to-go bowl. The food was excellent and the drinks are amazing and service and atmosphere is perfect we had an Amazing time. the mix grill was great! the service was also good.
